titleStmt.title: The speech of Denzill Hollis, Esquire at a conference with the Lords on Tuesday the third of August, 1641 : in justification of the three last printed votes by the House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Holles, Denzil Holles, Baron, 1599-1680.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
